basic.description: This is an introductory laboratory for students entering the electrical and computer engineering programs. The basic topics include: lab safety issues; solving engineering problems using software tools such as MATLAB and Mathematica; electric circuit simulations using c software packages such as Multisim and OrCad; electric circuit design and instrumentation; the proper use of test and measurement equipment.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: ECE Engineering Tools Lab
